results.title: Report a missed bin collection | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: If your rubbish, recycling, food or garden waste has not been collected, you can report it to us as a missed collection.

results.title: Report a missed collection | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: You can only report a missed collection within 2 working days. If you report it more than two working days after your collection day, it'll be ...

results.title: Report a missed collection | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: You can report a missed collection online. You can call or email us if there is another problem with this service.

results.title: Report a missed collection | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: If we missed your collection by mistake, we'll reschedule collection for the next working day after you report it. You can only report it within 2 working days.

results.title: Report a missed collection | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: You can only report it within 2 working days. After this you will have to wait for your next collection. If you have put the wrong items in ...

results.title: Report a missed collection
results.snippet: This form is for reporting a missed refuse, reycling, garden or food waste collection. Continue. Step 1: Find your address. Use my current location. Number.

results.title: Report a missed collection | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: Tell us if your collection is missed, or if there is another problem with your collection. Report it by calling 020 7926 9000.

results.title: Rubbish and Recycling | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: Report a missed bin collection Email: StreetCareCallCentre@lambeth.gov.uk Telephone: 020 7926 9000.

results.title: Street cleaning, rubbish and recycling | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: Check your bin collection day · Report a missed bin collection · Rubbish collections · Recycling collections · Waste collection calendars · Waste reduction ...

results.title: Container requests
results.snippet: You can also report broken domestic and commercial bins, request additional commercial bins, and request a larger domestic refuse bin if you fit the criteria.

selected_links.title: Report a missed bin collection | Lambeth Council
strengths: Easy to understand snippet and title
Directly relates to the request for council customer information
selected_links.reasoning: This link provides a straightforward process to report a missed bin collection on the Lambeth Council official website.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.answer_quality: The content partially addresses this need, as the information provided explains the steps for reporting a missed bin collection.
Reason.reasoning: The page provides clear instructions on how to report a missed bin collection and mentions the time frame within which to do so (2 working days). However, it does not specify how long it might take for the crew to collect the bin after being reported or what to do if the bin still hasn't been collected past the 2-day window.
Reason.next_actions: After reading this content, I would report the missed collection promptly as per the instructions provided. If my bin is not collected by the following morning, I might contact customer service for further assistance.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content is helpful and answers most of the resident's needs, but it does have key gaps in information that are important to address, such as expected time for collection after reporting a missed pickup and follow-up actions if the collection still doesn't occur.
